text: Scott Christopher Richard Grimes (born July 9, 1971) is an American actor and songwriter. He played Archie Morris in ER, Will McCorkle in Party of Five, Donald Malarkey in Band of Brothers, and Steve Smith in American Dad!. Grimes was born in Lowell, Massachusetts. He married Dawn Bailey-Grimes for ten years. ==Other websites== * * INTERVIEW: Robin Hood's Merry Men | Rip It Up Magazine Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:People from Lowell, Massachusetts Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:Singers from Massachusetts Category:Musicians from Massachusetts
title: Scott Grimes
